Web

buckeyenotes/beginner

desï¼šNote taking apps are all the rage lately but turns our theyâ€™re harder to make than I thought :/. Even in development buckeyenotes has gotten some traction, Brutus signed up! I think his user name is brutusB3stNut9999. I wonder what kind of notes he writes ğŸ¤” but I donâ€™t have his loginâ€¦. https://buckeyenotes.chall.pwnoh.io

æ¥çœ‹çœ‹å›½é™…å‹äººçš„é¢˜ç›®ï¼Œç™»å½•ç•Œé¢ï¼Œé¢˜ç›®è¯´äº†Brutusçš„ç”¨æˆ·åæ˜¯brutusB3stNut9999 å¾ˆè‡ªç„¶æƒ³åˆ°sqlæ³¨å…¥äº†ï¼Œäºæ˜¯å¯¹æ¯”ä¸€ä¸‹è¾“å…¥å›æ˜¾ï¼Œå‘ç°å¯èƒ½çœŸçš„å­˜åœ¨æ³¨å…¥äº† ç„¶åä¸€ç•ªæŠ˜è…¾å‘ç°äº†è¿™ä¸ªï¼Œæ„æ€åº”è¯¥æ˜¯è¿‡æ»¤äº†ç­‰å·ã€‚é‚£å°±ç›´æ¥1' or 1 -- - åº”è¯¥æ˜¯å·²ç»æˆåŠŸæŸ¥è¯¢äº†ï¼Œç„¶åæƒ³ç€é™åˆ¶ä¸€ä¸‹æŸ¥è¯¢æ•°é‡çœ‹çœ‹ï¼Œä¹Ÿæ˜¯è¯•äº†ä¸å°‘æ¬¡

pong/beginner

desï¼šI dug up my first ever JavaScript game, but this time, my AI is unbeatable!! Hah! https://pong.chall.pwnoh.io

A JavaScript gameï¼Œæˆ‘å¯¹JavaScriptçš„å°è±¡å°±æ˜¯ç›´æ¥åœ¨å“åº”åŒ…ä¸­æ‰¾base64åŠ å¯†è¿‡çš„flagï¼Œæˆ–è€…æ˜¯consoleå¼¹ä¸€æ®µä»£ç å¾—åˆ°flagï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªé¢˜ç›®è¿˜çœŸæ˜¯æ¶¨è§è¯†äº†

<script>
const socket = io();
const canvas = document.getElementById("game");
const pl = .16;
const pw = .02;
const bs = .04;
var up = 0;
var down = 0;
var p1 = .5;
var p2 = .5;
var bx = .5;
var by = .5;
var bvx = 0;
var bvy = 0;
var spin = 0;
var bt = 0;

var s1 = 0;
var s2 = 0;

function reset(ctx) {
  ctx.resetTransform();
  ctx.translate(0, 0.5);
  ctx.lineWidth = 1;
}

function set() {
  bx = 0.5;
  by = 0.5;
  bvx = 0;
  bvy = 0;
  bt = 0;
  spin = 0;
}

function draw() {
  canvas.width = canvas.clientWidth;
  canvas.height = canvas.clientHeight;
  const w = canvas.width;
  const h = canvas.height;
  const ctx = canvas.getContext("2d");
  reset(ctx);
  ctx.fillStyle = "#FFFFFF";
  ctx.fillRect(0, 0, w, h);

  // field lines
  ctx.fillStyle = "#aaaaaa";
  for(var y = 0; y < 1; y += .1) {
    ctx.fillRect(w / 2 - 5, (y + .025) * h, 10, .05 * h);
  }

  // ball
  ctx.fillStyle = "#000000";
  ctx.translate(bx * w, by * h);
  bt += spin;
  while(bt < 0) bt += 360;
  while(bt > 359) bt -= 360;
  ctx.rotate(bt * Math.PI / 180);

  ctx.fillRect(-(bs * h) / 2, -(bs * h) / 2, bs * h, bs * h);
  reset(ctx);

  // paddles
  ctx.fillStyle = "#000000";
  ctx.fillRect(pw * w, (p1 - pl / 2) * h, pw * w, pl * h);
  ctx.fillRect((1 - 2 * pw) * w, (p2 - pl / 2) * h, pw * w, pl * h);

  // scores
  for(var x = 0; x < 20; x++) {
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.rect(x * .05 * w, 0, .05 * w, 0.01 * h);
    ctx.stroke();
    if(x < s1) ctx.fillRect(x * .05 * w, 0, .05 * w, 0.01 * h);
    if(x > 9 && s2 > 19 - x) ctx.fillRect(x * .05 * w, 0, .05 * w, 0.01 * h);
  }
}

function tick() {
  const w = canvas.width;
  const h = canvas.height;

  // controls
  if(p1 - up * .01 > pl / 2) p1 -= up * .01;
  if(p1 + down * .01 < 1 - pl / 2) p1 += down * .01;
  p2 = by;

  // ball
  if(bvx != 0) spin = bvy / bvx * 5;
  bx += bvx;
  by += bvy;
  if(by < 0 || by > 1) bvy *= -1; // v bounce
  if(bx < pw * 2) {
    // left paddle bounce
    if(by > p1 - pl / 2 && by < p1 + pl / 2) {
      let diff = by - p1;
      bvy = .015 * diff / (pl / 2);
      bvx = .015 - Math.abs(bvy);
    }
  }
  if(bx > 1 - pw * 2) {
    // right paddle bounce
    if(by > p2 - pl / 2 && by < p2 + pl / 2) {
      let diff = by - p2;
      bvy = .015 * diff / (pl / 2);
      bvx = -(.015 - Math.abs(bvy));
    }   
  }

  if(bx < -.1 || bx > 1.1) {
    socket.emit("score", bx);
  }

  draw();
}

function init() {
  draw();
  setInterval(tick, 13);
  document.addEventListener("keydown", (e) => {
    if(e.key == "w") up = 1;
    if(e.key == "s") down = 1;
    if(e.key == "p") {
      socket.emit("begin");
    }
  });
  document.addEventListener("keyup", (e) => {
    if(e.key == "w") up = 0;
    if(e.key == "s") down = 0;
  });
}

socket.on("alert", (msg) => alert(msg));
socket.on("begin", (params) => {
  bvx = params.bvx;
  bvy = params.bvy;
});
socket.on("set", (scores) => {
  set();
  s1 = scores.sx1;
  s2 = scores.sx2;
});
</script>

Since JavaScript is a client-side language, we can use our console in the developer tool to control some variables.

So å¤§æ„å°±æ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥åœ¨å¼€å‘è€…å·¥å…·çš„æ§åˆ¶å°ä¸­æ§åˆ¶è¿™äº›å˜é‡ï¼Œå°½ç®¡çœ‹ä¸å¤ªæ‡‚jsï¼Œä½†å¤§æ¦‚èƒ½çŸ¥é“s1å’Œs2æ˜¯åˆ†æ•°ï¼Œè€Œs1æ˜¯æˆ‘çš„åˆ†æ•°ï¼Œs2æ˜¯å¯¹æ‰‹çš„åˆ†æ•°ï¼Œäºæ˜¯å¯ä»¥åœ¨æ§åˆ¶å°ä¸­ä¿®æ”¹å˜é‡ã€‚ ä½†æ˜¯æ²¡å•¥ç”¨å•Šã€‚ä½†æ˜¯è¿™æ ·æ‰“å¼€äº†æ€è·¯ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ‰¾å…¶ä»–å˜é‡è¯•è¯•ï¼Œæœ€åå‘ç°äº†bxè¿™ä¸ªå˜é‡ï¼Œæ˜¯ballåœ¨xåæ ‡ä¸Šçš„ä½ç½®ï¼Œäºæ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥è‡ªå·±æ§åˆ¶çƒçš„ä½ç½® æœ€åä»¤bxç­‰äº1.5ï¼Œçƒå°±è¶Šè¿‡äº†å¯¹æ‰‹çš„é˜²çº¿(è¶…å‡ºäº†å±å¹•)ï¼Œwe win ï¼ï¼Œå°±å¾—åˆ°äº†flag

what-you-see-is-what-you-git/beginner

desï¼šI definitely made a Git repo, but I somehow broke it. Something about not getting a HEAD of myself.

gitç›¸å…³çš„é¢˜ç›®ï¼Œå…³é”®è¿˜æ˜¯logsæ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ŒHEADä¸­æœ‰äº›çº¿ç´¢ ç„¶åæ¢å¤Hid the flagæäº¤çš„æš‚å­˜åŒº

git reset â€“hard 7ae8453a76a41d40bdfcc7992175390f70ba9fdf æ³¨è§£ # é‡ç½®æš‚å­˜åŒºä¸å·¥ä½œåŒºï¼Œä¸ä¸Šä¸€æ¬¡commitä¿æŒä¸€è‡´

å†

git log -p [file] æ³¨è§£# æ˜¾ç¤ºæŒ‡å®šæ–‡ä»¶ç›¸å…³çš„æ¯ä¸€æ¬¡diff

å¾—åˆ°flag

sus/easy

desï¼šSomething about this audio is pretty susâ€¦ Hint: The crackling in the audio should tell you that somethingâ€™s wrong.

wavçš„LSBéšå†™ï¼Œå‚åŠ  Medium blog!

import wave
song = wave.open("sus.wav", mode='rb')
# Convert audio to byte array
frame_bytes = bytearray(list(song.readframes(song.getnframes())))

# Extract the LSB of each byte
extracted = [frame_bytes[i] & 1 for i in range(len(frame_bytes))]
# Convert byte array back to string
string = "".join(chr(int("".join(map(str,extracted[i:i+8])),2)) for i in range(0,len(extracted),8))
# Cut off at the filler characters
decoded = string.split("###")[0]

# Print the extracted text
print("Sucessfully decoded: "+decoded)
song.close()

keyboardwarrior/medium

desï¼šI found a PCAP of some Bluetooth packets being sent on this guyâ€™s computer. Heâ€™s sending some pretty weird stuff, you should take a look. Flag format: buckeyectf{}

ç›¸å¯¹å¹³æ—¶çš„è“ç‰™æµé‡ï¼Œæ˜¯å¾ˆæ–°çš„é¢˜ç›®ï¼ˆåè®®ï¼‰äº†ã€‚HCI_EVTå’ŒATTåè®®ï¼Œå…³äºåè®®æ‡’å¾—å»æ·±ç©¶äº†ï¼Œåæ­£å’Œä¸€èˆ¬çš„é”®ç›˜æ•°æ®æ•°æ®æ®µç›¸åŒã€‚ _ ä¸€å¤§å †æ•°æ®ä¸­åªæœ‰ç¬¬ä¸‰ä¸ªå­—èŠ‚ä¸åŒï¼Œäºæ˜¯æŠŠä»¥å‰å†™çš„è„šæœ¬æ¢ä¸ªå¯¼å‡ºå­—æ®µï¼Œæ”¹æ”¹å°±è¡Œ https://github.com/may1as/UsbMiceDataexp é‚£ä¸ªvalueçš„è¿‡æ»¤å™¨å­—æ®µå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼Œç„¶å-eæ›¿æ¢æˆbtatt.valueå³å¯ _ä½†æ˜¯è¿™é‡Œè¿˜æœ‰ä¸ªå‘ï¼Œå¾—æŠŠ_[]_æ¢æˆ_{}_ï¼Œ_-_æ¢æˆ___ï¼Œç¬¦å·ä¸åŒå¯èƒ½æ˜¯å­—å…¸ä¸ä¸€è‡´å¯¼è‡´çš„ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯è¿™é‡Œæ— ä¼¤å¤§é›…
